post.body: Melvin is definitely cute.
You better be careful, you are treading on thin ice. How did all that inbreeding in Wyoming affect you, btw?
I know @timmelko has a weird aversion to anything country...damn all elitists!
- I do not think you should click the last link I posted... <3 I just want to protect you.
"I am so over it." = You need a babysitter?
Ha! I DO say stoked! *preens* Suits my style, you say? Hear that everyone? I've got style!
I still say "score!" sometimes, "chica" is from then I think, I say yeppers...but I am not ashamed!
About the war video game? I imagined Ender's Game but without real spaceships at the other end.
Thanks for the warning. Much appreciated by us.
@rdeal1 for #socialmedia cause if he was any more social, i don't think i could take it
That sounds good too!
and one or two slices of crisp but juicy bacon
egg over medium, 1/2 an English muffin with smart balance light butter, pineapple and blueberries, small o.j.
I like to look up old (& new) comedy sketches on YouTube. Does that count? http://tinyurl.com/3u5bad
Hi!
Prego, eh? Is it possible? I use to like those dreams b4 I thought I might be a barren wasteland. ;)
I wasn't going out again, the guy is a regular at my Mom's Starbucks. Ergo...he has been there both times I was this week.
I must know about these dreams.
So exciting for you! I will see you in California as soon as I can! I was born there... It will be a homecoming of sorts.
I am at a loss of what to say. I hope you are surrounding yourself with loved ones & good for you celebrating for your son.
One the night before, then the rest on Christmas morning!
What happened? Big snafu at work?
Have fun and be safe in Dallas! :( Wish I was still there to see you!
Good morning, @walkinmyheels - What do you have planned for the day?
Ahem. Have I mentioned that Stevie Wonder is a god?
I love Dire Wolf. I love the Grateful Dead. *happy sigh* "In the timbers of Fenario, the wolves are runnin' round..."
SICK! REVOLTING! Yet enticing... http://tinyurl.com/5uf6l2
*waves happily at "everyone"*
I love @nicoleslaw
I knew you meant a game not based in reality, but I didn't envision Halo. Interesting... Yay for randomness.
Baffling context clues.
What is this new catch phrase where people (girls) say "I'm so over it though!"? I don't think it means they are over it. Context clues.
"Good day sunshine, good day sunshine! " Mmm, hot orange cider at work.
Heehee. For the nerdy girl in all our hearts... http://tinyurl.com/4f4ngl and on that happy note - good night!
I miss knowing Paul Newman and Kurt Vonnegut were alive.
I want to know how every country got the name that the world knows it by today. I mean, who made the final call on that?
That is a good breakfast.
Sleep for now, Land of the Twitterers.
Thoughts of empty gas stations, midnight train whistles, missed chances & disappointed houses play on as part of a broken loop in my head.
"We're all out of cornflakes...F.U.!!" Best scene in the movie! http://tinyurl.com/6pjejc
Isn't it amazing that when we experience a broken heart or "heartache", our chest (close to our hearts) actually aches?
Feeling guilty b/c I didn't work out tonight.
AWKWARD!
Yet again, Bad Date is here @starbucks. *groan* And still sulking b/c I won't go out another time! *eye roll*
Thinking about Sir Isaac Newton, gravity and weight loss (all different reasons) while putting up scopes. So random.
*bleary eyed stumbling & grumbling* "Mornin'. Twitter"
Good night, Twitterverse!
My brother is introducing me to his favorite show- 24. Hello, Kiefer Sutherland!
Slipping into auto-pilot. Food coma takes over. Brain slowing down...
Food coma. -Sweet pot. casserole, corn casserole, ham, turkey, gravy, mashed pot., turnip greens, black eyed peas, beets, green beans, onion
Yay! Good morning. Mmmm, cinnamon rolls and coffee with lots of presents and an adorable tot. Merry Christmas morning!
I have to get off here and distract myself or I will think the entire night away. Merry Christmas Eve, tweet heads.
Looks like I will be spending Christmas Eve alone after all.
You could describe me as changeable. Yes, you could. Well...maybe not. No, yes. Um, well, partly. Definitely.
My opinions are exhausting me. I am tired of having them. I would like to embrace a live of less opinions immediately. If possible...
Loaded Sam Cooke, Willie Nelson, CCR and a few soundtracks on my new iPod. I don't know what I did before I had it. We are inseparable now.
Biked 12 miles and my legs feel rubbery and wobbly. It has been too long! I stopped to watch a group of 15 white pelicans though...pretty.
Going biking!! *happy dance*
I don't at all feel like today is Christmas Eve.
3 am- awake & listening to Beethoven. The brat in me needs sleep but it won't happen!
